EmailTemplate.name: 201708_Americas_Event_GoDirectCustomerEvent_mih.201708_Americas_Event_GoDirectCu
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Invited - Customer Advisory Board Meeting for Honeywell GoDirect Cabin Services
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join us for the Aerospace Connectivity Briefing
Dear valued customers and partners,
We are pleased to invite you to the Honeywell | GoDirect Operator Briefing in Nuremberg.
Date: Feb. 8, 2017
Location: The Mövenpick Conference Center at Nuremberg Airport
Flughafenstraße 100, 90411 Nuremberg, Germany
This briefing will give you a comprehensive overview and understanding of the latest services available from Honeywell's GoDirect Cabin Connectivity. A special focus will be on the new Honeywell Jetwave system, and Jet Connex service now available through the Inmarsat Global Express Ka-band network.
This event is co-hosted by Aero-Dienst and Inmarsat, and is a great opportunity to get answers to your questions about all connectivity products, services, networks and more.
Topics include: C onnectivity updates | Ka-Band | SwiftBroadband | SBB-Safety | Flight Support Services | Hardware and Software updates | New applications | Technical Support | Jetwave Ka-band demo.
If you are staying overnight, you can book hotel rooms at the Mövenpick Hotel Nürnberg-Airport at preferred rates of €115,00 per night including breakfast. You can book via phone (+49 911 35010) or email <[[mailto:hotel.nuernberg.airport@movenpick.com]]> and use the code HONEYWELL to benefit from these rates. Please note that the number of rooms at these rates are limited and will be provided on a “first come first served” basis.
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER <[[mailto:Thinus.Svendsen@Honeywell.com; thomas.gierlich@honeywell.com]]>
Detailed agenda to follow.
